response.overview: Since he was 10 years old, Riley Samuel has been bullying, intimidating and exploiting anyone he could to achieve power. Now he must confront his childhood and the choices he's made after being accused of murder. With the help of criminal psychologist DR. Staci Brennan, Riley must explore his history and trace back the path to what made him a bully, before receiving his final sentence.
response.title: Bullified
